      • getFolder

        public static java.util.Optional<com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.databaseservice.WritableDatabaseService> getFolder​(com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.documents.AnnotatedPluginDocument[] docs)
        Returns the folder to be used for document queries, updates and inserts. If the user has selected any documents, the folder of the first document is returned, else the folder selected by the user in the GUI. If no folder was selected either, an empty Optional is returned.
        Parameters:
        docs -
        Returns:

      • getDatabase

        public static java.util.Optional<com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.databaseservice.WritableDatabaseService> getDatabase​(com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.documents.AnnotatedPluginDocument[] docs)
        Returns the database (root folder) to be used for document queries, updates and inserts. If the user has selected any documents, the root folder of the first document is returned, else the root folder of the folder selected by the user in the GUI. If no folder was selected either, an empty Optional is returned.
        Parameters:
        docs -
        Returns:
